steps.nodeStepDescription: A grenade that periodically damages enemies inside its explosion radius.
Your Thunderstrike chains to another nearby enemy.
Deliver an electrocuting Arc melee strike at extended range.
Your Thunderstrike has greater range.
A grenade that calls down a focused lightning storm.
A grenade that chains bolts of lightning to nearby enemies.
Chain Arc Lightning from your hands.
Upgrades Glide to provide an initial boost of speed.
Upgrades Glide to provide bonuses to both speed and control.
Jump and then press  again while in the air to activate Glide.
Upgrades Glide for better directional control while in the air.
Doubles your Stormtrance lightning's chaining capabilities.
Press  to teleport during Stormtrance.
On casting Stormtrance, fire a bolt of lightning into the ground, creating a devastating shockwave under you.
Hits with Thunderstrike charge your Super, Ability and melee energy.
Training focused on toughness and speed.
Training focused on battle recovery and speed.
Training focused on battle recovery and toughness.
Incoming melee attacks fully recharge and intensify your Thunderstrike.
When critically wounded, trigger a Pulsewave that boosts speed for you and your allies.
When cast with full grenade and melee energy, Stormtrance restores your health to full and drains slower.
Training focused on raw speed.
Training focused on toughness at all costs.
Training focused on all attributes.
Enemies damaged by your grenades chain deadly lightning to nearby enemies.
Grenade kills recharge your melee. Melee kills recharge your grenade.
Stormtrance charges faster when allies are near. When Stormtrance is active, nearby enemies take damage.
